attributes.additional_details:
Build the Enterprise is a plan established to build the "USS Enterprise" from Star Trek, in 20 years following a plan created on this internet site : http://www.buildtheenterprise.org
(I'm am not the one who created the site or the project, and for more information please contact him)

If the United Kingdom lead the charge, to achieve this momentous project. The UK would not just be at the forefront of the new space race, it would also permit the creation of new jobs, new technologies and innovate in a blooming market.

This project could either be undertaken just by the United Kingdom or could be a joint venture with various countries of the world and (or) the European Union.

It would inspire future generations of Britons and inhabitants of the world, to explore and innovate, and in whole progress the entire human race.

The United Kingdom would be remembered as the country that paved the way for space exploration and high tech innovation.
